en.servedByAlternativeMethodStatusMsg: Your divorce petition has been served by an alternative method
en.servedByAlternativeMethod: Your {{ divorceWho }} was served by an alternative method. However, they have not yet responded.
en.servedByAlternativeMethodAosOverdue: Because it is more than 7 days since confirmation of service, you are now able continue to the next stage and apply for a decree nisi.
